title: Heavy Snow
call: 1" snowfall per hour or greater or per HWO guidelines
criteria:
Plains: 6" or more in 12 hours or 8" in 24 hours
Mountains: 8" or more in 12 hours or 12" in 24 hours.

title: Blizzard
call:
Winds 35 mph or greater
Visibility less than 1/4 mile in snow and/or blowing snow.
criteria:
Sustained/Frequent gusts 35 mph or more for 3 hours.
Visibilities < 1/4 mile for 3 hours
Considerable blowing/drifting snow.
copyright: Copyright University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR). By Carlye Calvin, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0) License, via OpenSky. For commercial use contact copyright@ucar.edu.

title: Storm Totals
call:
12/24 hour snowfall/snow depth.
By 8am/8pm of when snow has stopped.
criteria: Take average of 5 measurements if drifting has occurred and measure to nearest tenth of an inch.

title: High Winds
call: 50 mph or higher-sustained or gusts (specify estimate or measured).
criteria:
Lower Elevations: Sustained 40 mph. Gusts 58 mph or more.
Mountains: Sustained 50 mph. Gusts 75 mph or more.
